QuestData.Title: Demon in Disguise
QuestData.Description: While you were... working your magic on that demon, I was able to make headway in distilling the corrupted essences down to a simpler, more manageable form.$B$BI've asked Khadgar to provide you with the concoction once he's had a look, but I must remind you - these essences are quite potent, often dangerous if not handled with the utmost of care.$B$BSpeak with Khadgar when you are ready to begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Archmage Khadgar in Deadwind Pass.
